Quiet Elegance.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Omurice Waltz.name: Omurice Waltz
Omurice Waltz.desc: Kuki Shinobu's specialty. The soft egg skin almost seems to dance upon a stage made from sauce, with fluffy rice wrapped under its swaying skirt. This would even be a match for the work of Uyuu Restaurant's head chef. Truly, Shinobu's chef license was not earned in vain.
Omurice Waltz.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Dew-Dipped Shrimp.name: Dew-Dipped Shrimp
Dew-Dipped Shrimp.desc: Yelan's specialty. Amongst the ingredients here is the new tea, Dipped Dew, delivered from Qiaoying Village right to the Teahouse, which was then quickly fried together with freshly-caught river shrimp. The look is sightly, the scent of distant tea, and the taste both tender and springy... Wait a moment. Why's she coming over with that plate of chili?
Dew-Dipped Shrimp.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

The Only Truth.name: The Only Truth
The Only Truth.desc: Shikanoin Heizou's specialty. On the tender, moist scrambled eggs lies a juicy katsu fried to golden perfection, its aroma most enticing indeed... Having been tempted to gobble the dish down, you are somehow seized by the urge to let out all that is hidden in your heart — this is not some sort of secret weapon of Heizou... is it?
The Only Truth.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 114 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Forest Watcher's Choice.name: Forest Watcher's Choice
Forest Watcher's Choice.desc: Tighnari's specialty. The Forest Watcher personally picked out these edible mushrooms — not only the common ones but also a few mysterious-looking shrooms that you have never seen before. No condiments were added, for the limelight should go to the ingredients' unmarred freshness. It must have taken him quite some time to prepare this delicious dish.
Forest Watcher's Choice.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 151 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Yearning.name: Yearning
Yearning.desc: Collei's specialty. Nutrient-rich ingredients have been stuffed inside the soft pastry shell to create a filling dish fit for those on the move. According to Collei, the cutlet in it is named "Forest Rangers' barbecue!" ... You know, this rather reminds you of a certain enthusiastic girl in red. The dish must be the embodiment of Collei's innermost admiration.
Yearning.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

Show Me the Mora.name: Show Me the Mora
Show Me the Mora.desc: Dori's specialty. After paying a large sum of Mora, you finally got a chance to taste the dish cooked by Lord Sangemah Bay herself. Firm chicken is covered in the silky sauce with a smooth texture. With the mind-controlling charm of its great flavor, this dish is spurring an impulse in you to spend another fortune just to get another bite!
Show Me the Mora.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Swirling Steps.name: Swirling Steps
Swirling Steps.desc: Nilou's specialty. The crystal-clear cup that reminds you of an ornate jewel case contains a soft, melt-in-your-mouth pudding. The reddish coloration, like a fleeting trance, reminds you ever so much of Nilou's radiant, dancing form. Ah, would that this dance might last forever.
Swirling Steps.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Duel Soul.name: Duel Soul
Duel Soul.desc: Cyno's specialty. The golden grains of rice have been piled up like a most remarkable hill. As you scoop out a chunk and place the fragrant meat into your mouth, an impulse you cannot name rises within your chest — a desire to whip out your Genius Invokation deck and duel!
Duel Soul.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

Utmost Care.name: Utmost Care
Utmost Care.desc: Candace's specialty. The aroma of this dish hits your nose long before it can be plated up. It would seem that Candace's adept guardianship also extends to sustaining appetites... But, uh, this really is an extraordinary amount of Aaru Mixed Rice. How are you supposed to deal with this mountain of "overflowing consideration"?

Extravagant Slumber.name: Extravagant Slumber
Extravagant Slumber.desc: Layla's specialty. The scattered nuts are like stars dotted in the deep and quiet night sky. After just one bite, your body and mind after a day's work suddenly felt relaxed and peaceful. When you told Layla about that feeling, she showed a mixed expression of joy and regret — "Th—That's great! Ah, if only it could work for me too."
Extravagant Slumber.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

Halvamazd.name: Halvamazd
Halvamazd.desc: Nahida's specialty. It is said that "mazd" means "wisdom" in Sumeru, and such delicate "wisdom" is simply irresistible. There is a gentle smile in Nahida's eyes: "The sea anemone has helped the little fish and witnessed its growth, so it's only natural for the little fish to give something back."
Halvamazd.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 282 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Traditionally-Made Charcoal-Baked Ajilen.name: Traditionally-Made Charcoal-Baked Ajilenakh Cake
Traditionally-Made Charcoal-Baked Ajilen.desc: Faruzan's specialty. The dark and sweet cake, lying as it does atop a minty-green sauce bed, almost looks like some enigmatic mechanism. Your hesitation must have somehow reached Faruzan, for she then straightened up to assertively reassure you that this was a traditional dish in Sumeru and that its flavor is guaranteed. But you can't help wondering... Is it really a "traditional" dish that catered to the tastes of Sumeru people a hundred years ago?
Traditionally-Made Charcoal-Baked Ajilen.effect: Revives the selected character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1500 HP.

Shimi Chazuke.name: Shimi Chazuke
Shimi Chazuke.desc: Wanderer's specialty. The mildly bitter fragrance of tea and the refreshingly sweet aroma of rice are perfectly blended together, leaving you to wolf it down insatiably. How did he manage to cook something so extraordinary? Ah, your expression must have betrayed this thought to him, for his face suddenly turns grim: "Have you finished yet? Stop gawking and go wash the dishes now."
Shimi Chazuke.effect: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Ideal Circumstance.name: Ideal Circumstance
Ideal Circumstance.desc: Alhaitham's specialty. A dish created through the fusion of vegetables and meat prepared in a patterned frying pan. Improvements were made to the recipe, making it taste quite different from the original dish. The words on the food mean "contemplation." In the words of the creator: "Ideally, everyone should be capable of contemplation, but practically, it doesn't seem very possible."
Ideal Circumstance.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

Qingce Household Dish.name: Qingce Household Dish
Qingce Household Dish.desc: Yaoyao's specialty. It looks rather mundane as it is not displayed with the same luxurious aesthetic as dishes prepared by a fancy restaurant. However, as soon as you take a bite, the flavor immediately offers you a fragrant and intimate experience, certain to leave an ever-lasting impression. After a single taste, what's on your tongue will be on your heart for good. As for the reason, maybe the secret ingredient to this recipe is simply "caring."
Qingce Household Dish.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Goldflame Tajine.name: Goldflame Tajine
Goldflame Tajine.desc: Dehya's specialty. As you open the unassuming lid, you are greeted with supple meat that turns out to be so tender that one could get drunk on the sensation of it slipping between your lips... It seems that Dehya's dab kitchen hand is as steady as her sword-arm.
Goldflame Tajine.effect: Increases all party members' Max HP by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Surveyor's Breakfast Sandwich.name: Surveyor's Breakfast Sandwich
Surveyor's Breakfast Sandwich.desc: Mika's specialty. The luxurious spread before you is a veritable hillock of ingredients, and as you take a small bite, each clearly-demarcated layer of flavor and savory spice spreads throughout your mouth, as if you have climbed some mountain of gourmet. Are these the culinary skills he has honed while with the Knights?
Surveyor's Breakfast Sandwich.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

The Endeavor.name: The Endeavor
The Endeavor.desc: Kaveh's specialty. The golden crust of the biscuit is arranged to resemble the Palace of Alcazarzaray, and the meal rises like a tower from a pure-white pond of yogurt sauce. Though the creator of the dish has placed a monumental amount of effort into its creation, he seems to have missed the fact that all the biscuits must be broken during the process of consumption.
The Endeavor.effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

Heat-Quelling Soup.name: Heat-Quelling Soup
Heat-Quelling Soup.desc: Baizhu's specialty. "This isn't actually medicine, merely something that can alleviate dryness." As Baizhu's concerned voice echoes in your ears, a bowl of lustrous fruit soup greets your gaze. "This dish didn't use to have sugar, but he was worried that you wouldn't be used to the bitter taste, so he added some to it," added Changsheng.
Heat-Quelling Soup.effect: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Energizing Bento.name: Energizing Bento
Energizing Bento.desc: Kirara's specialty. A human-friendly bento box Kirara put in a great deal of effort to prepare. By observing the preferences of human girls, she came up with this combination of well-balanced side dishes and adorable cat-shaped rice balls. It's just like a carefully wrapped package... You could receive one every day and never get tired of it!
Energizing Bento.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

\"Seabird's Sojourn\".name: "Seabird's Sojourn"
\"Seabird's Sojourn\".desc: Freminet's specialty. He fled after leaving this pot of soup. The ingredients don't seem to come from shallow seas, which means he must've dived into the deep sea to catch them. You want to express your gratitude, but... where can you find him?
\"Seabird's Sojourn\".effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

Cubic Tricks.name: Cubic Tricks
Cubic Tricks.desc: Lyney's specialty. He covered the fruit you picked with velvet and then uncovered it — voila! You were greeted by a colorful assortment of gummies. You sampled one and your mood immediately changed. Did the great magician cast some incredible enchantment spell to bewitch the heart while no one was watching?
Cubic Tricks.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

A Leisurely Sip.name: A Leisurely Sip
A Leisurely Sip.desc: Lynette's specialty. It was time for afternoon tea, and Lynette laid down a snack made especially for you. The image of the young lady who taking small sips from the cup and the image of the kitten-shaped dessert seemed to overlap. Your heart was filled with sweetness, but you were also a bit concerned about the state of the kitchenware...
A Leisurely Sip.effect: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

\"Consomme Purete\".name: "Consomme Purete"
\"Consomme Purete\".desc: Neuvillette's specialty. He claims he specifically selected the purest, chilliest waters from the highest mountains to create this exquisite and matchless treasure. Though it does have a refreshing quality, as for how the overall flavor of the soup is no different from ordinary soups... It's probably best not to mention it.
\"Consomme Purete\".effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Secret Sauce BBQ Ribs.name: Secret Sauce BBQ Ribs
Secret Sauce BBQ Ribs.desc: Wriothesley's specialty. Soon after kicking out his subordinates with the excuse, "Feel free to leave, but I'm staying! Things are heating up in here, and it could blow!", a meatastic delicacy greets your eyes. A full-bodied sauce slathered over flaky skin brings an extraordinary double blast of deliciousness, though as you taste it, it does seem to be practically identically to a condiment that has become awfully popular recently...
Secret Sauce BBQ Ribs.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 1,750 HP to the selected character.

\"Pour la Justice\".name: "Pour la Justice"
\"Pour la Justice\".desc: Furina's specialty. "Pour la Justice" means "veneration of justice" in Fontaine, and she who once performed on the greatest of stages bore witness to the birth of sublime justice. Its layered flavors seem to swell and fade like the waves of the sea, before finally relaxing as though laying down a heavy burden. Perhaps it reflects something she personally experienced?
\"Pour la Justice\".effect: Increases all party members' Max HP by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Exclusive Scoop: Gourmet Column.name: Exclusive Scoop: Gourmet Column
Exclusive Scoop: Gourmet Column.desc: Charlotte's specialty. A snack that she stuffed in your hands while you accompany her on a relentless pursuit of exclusive scoops. You glance at her skipping beside you, and the excited rhythm of her steps slowly overlaps with the crackling of crispy fried fish fillets in your mouth... Though this latest news has yet to be turned into a finished story, the joy and contentment in your heart has already reached its peak.

Sin: The Kind that Doesn't Need to be De.name: Sin: The Kind that Doesn't Need to be Dealt With
Sin: The Kind that Doesn't Need to be De.desc: Chevreuse's specialty. There is something indubitably "sinful" about this dish from a health standpoint. As the leader of the Special Security and Surveillance Patrol, she will not lightly hand the task of dealing with sin to others — this is a matter of professionalism and personal ethics, after all. Sometimes, though, sharing such a solemn duty with one she trusts deeply is an... acceptable way of relieving stress.
Sin: The Kind that Doesn't Need to be De.effect: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

\"Pick What You Like!\".name: "Pick What You Like!"
\"Pick What You Like!\".desc: Navia's specialty. "Come on, pick the one you like!" Along with the familiar cries of joy, you see before your eyes the aesthetically pleasing double-layered dessert stand and the neat rows of macarons with different expressions painted onto them. One thought suddenly fascinates you... What expression would Navia make if you were to give in to greed and steal all of them for yourself?
\"Pick What You Like!\".effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Encompassing Gladness.name: Encompassing Gladness
Encompassing Gladness.desc: Xianyun's specialty. Before you can even look shocked to see these fragrant meatballs, she says: "Ah, and you thought such pedestrian culinary work could confound one? Now then, enjoy it while it remains hot — and may one wish you peace, joy, prosperity, and freedom from distress... *cough* What? A little ritual formality now and then could do no ill."
Encompassing Gladness.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Yummy Yum Cha.name: Yummy Yum Cha
Yummy Yum Cha.desc: Gaming's specialty. Row upon row of lifelike suanni buns sit pretty within the steamer, bringing the formidable, clever youth leaping amidst the Plum Blossom Pole... "What's with that dumbfounded expression? Have a cup of tea first, eh?" With that, the cheerfully smiling fellow passes you another cup.
Yummy Yum Cha.effect: Restores 14% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 350 HP every 5s for 30s.

\"Fashion Show\".name: "Fashion Show"
\"Fashion Show\".desc: Chiori's specialty. At the ministrations of her nimble fingers, even the common taiyaki is transformed, garbed in glorious fillings that serenade the senses, regaling your taste buds and eyes with such a grand feast that it threatens to overwhelm them. It would be no overstatement to call this a masterpiece of culinary artistry.
\"Fashion Show\".effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

Hearthfire's Trail.name: Hearthfire's Trail
Hearthfire's Trail.desc: Arlecchino's specialty. The raw meat, bereft of any excessive seasoning, brings a rush of both blood and brutal freshness, engraving an elegant ensemble of flavors on your tongue. The final aftertaste is cleaner and neater still, a mirror reflection of how its maker handles certain situations...
Hearthfire's Trail.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

Well-Balanced Meal.name: Well-Balanced Meal
Well-Balanced Meal.desc: Sigewinne's specialty. "You'd better finish it quickly, or the souffle will collapse!" Confronted with such a concerned tone and earnest gaze, you feel compelled to pick up your knife and fork. But then the sight of such familiar-looking chunks of mystery meat, combined with the still-fresh memory of her nutritious shakes... puts you at a loss for what to do next.
Well-Balanced Meal.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

\"Tagged and Bagged\".name: "Tagged and Bagged"
\"Tagged and Bagged\".desc: Clorinde's specialty. It consists of freshly caught Fowl that has been but only very slightly roasted. Your initial apprehension quickly vanishes after experiencing its tender texture and refreshing aftertaste for yourself. Anyway, Clorinde already took a bite herself. Surely your digestive system is as robust as a seasoned hunter's is... right?

Super-Dee-Duper Delicious Meat Roll.name: Super-Dee-Duper Delicious Meat Roll
Super-Dee-Duper Delicious Meat Roll.desc: Sethos's specialty. A subtle coarseness gives the pastry a satisfying, chewy texture. The grilled meat is seasoned in a way that makes it stand out from the usual recipes you'd find in a market, its delicious novelty taking your taste buds by storm. Sensing your desire for more, the unaffected youth sitting to one side gives you a wink and says: "Secret recipe — you won't find it anywhere else."
Super-Dee-Duper Delicious Meat Roll.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 114 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

A Fragrant Feast of Flavors.name: A Fragrant Feast of Flavors
A Fragrant Feast of Flavors.desc: Emilie's specialty. The fermented fruit juice holds a subtle floral fragrance that fills your palate with woody scents, while the silken cream glides alongside, imparting both taste and flavor in moderation. The afterglow of the abundant aroma lingers on, an indelible gourmet encounter.
A Fragrant Feast of Flavors.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Saurian Hunter's Reward.name: Saurian Hunter's Reward
Saurian Hunter's Reward.desc: Kinich's specialty. The large, richly flavored chunks of meat come in hot... and spicy to boot. Ajaw keeps mumbling by your side. "Consider yourself lucky to enjoy this for free! Why, in days past, we would only reward ourselves thus for a true big-game hunt. Indeed, you should be offering delicious fruit juice unto me as thanksgiving!" To which Kinich helpfully supplies, "Just eat. Ignore his nonsense."
Saurian Hunter's Reward.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Pass the Luck.name: Pass the Luck
Pass the Luck.desc: Mualani's specialty. Feet planted on her surfboard, dish in hand, she made not one, not two, but three loops around you before placing the sizable lobster before you. "Ta-da! Super huge and freshly caught — a stroke of luck if ever there was one! And now, I pass that luck onto you!" Her cheerful words all but grant the bean balls wrapped around the shrimp a golden glow.
Pass the Luck.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Impeccably Organized.name: Impeccably Organized
Impeccably Organized.desc: Kachina's specialty. The chips are arrayed in neat rows, fried just right. In their crunchy deliciousness, you can see Kachina's earnestness and care. Would it be too much motivation for her if you were to tell her how you felt about the dish, plus some compliments?
Impeccably Organized.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

Fruit-Flavored Milk Candies.name: Fruit-Flavored Milk Candies
Fruit-Flavored Milk Candies.desc: Xilonen's specialty. As you sit side-by-side atop the tree, she passes you an exquisite box filled with... variously shaped candies? "Cacahuatl is actually considered a kind of fruit. So, it should be fine to call candies made out of cacahuatl and milk 'fruit-flavored.' C'mon, let's dig in." So saying, she swiftly snatches one, tossing it into her mouth before biting down.

Fisherman's Toast.name: Fisherman's Toast

Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Grilled Tiger Fish.desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The shimmering golden skin has locked the fresh and tender meat in. You cannot help but sigh in satisfaction as you chew on it. Not a scrap of meat here will go uneaten, not even those stuck firmly to the bamboo stick.
Grilled Tiger Fish.longDesc:
A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.
Traditionally, the dish now known as Tiger Fish referred exclusively to grilled Ticker Fish. Over time, however, the dish's name turned into Tiger Fish, and came to refer to grilled fish in general. In fact, the true Ticker Fish underwent a sharp decline in population along with many other sea creatures years ago, and is now on the verge of extinction.

effect.Suspicious Grilled Tiger Fish: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

Barbatos Ratatouille.name: Barbatos Ratatouille
Barbatos Ratatouille.desc: A simple chowder with a long history. After much careful stewing, the flavors of three different vegetables have been blended to perfection. Like this, it is not hard to imagine why someone once called it "the best chowder I've ever tasted."

Apple Cider.name: Apple Cider

But once you work up the wherewithal to pick up those chopsticks and have at it, the delicious flavors will be utter bliss — leaving this as a mere work of art would be such a shame.

Tianshu Meat.name: Tianshu Meat

Lotus Flower Crisp.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
Lotus Flower Crisp.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The flower petals waver to life if you gently blow on them. As you close your eyes and take a bite, a luscious flavor covers your tastebuds like a sweet harmony of blooming flowers and fluttering birds in the breeze.

Moon Pie.name: Moon Pie

Northern Apple Stew.name: Northern Apple Stew
Northern Apple Stew.desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat is juicy in the extreme, and no matter how much of it you eat, you still want more. The way every breath you take is tinged with the flavor of apples reminds you of nothing so much as lying in an apple orchard.

Jueyun Guoba.name: Jueyun Guoba
Jueyun Guoba.desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Chow down on that lovely, fragrant crust and the steaming ham sitting atop it. Take a bite while it's hot, and have your tastebuds savor the tender minced meat and delicious juice, an experience which is then topped off with a finishing touch of sweet prawn. Before your eyes, you can almost see a full moon over rippling waters, a fishing boat by the shore, and the fishermen's songs echoing down the years.

effect.Fullmoon Egg: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

With the aid of the sauce, the matsutake has achieved an excellent, elegant mouth-feel that so rivals scallop in tenderness and abalone in freshness that you can hardly tell them apart. If you left your customer guessing before revealing the truth later, you would be sure to earn their astonished praise.

What lies before you is no mere dish, but a gentle breeze, a pure spring, a stroke of the divine.

The plump shrimp are packed full of flavor just waiting to burst out on the first bite, creating wave after wave of indulgent deliciousness, like drops of water falling one by one onto a still lake, ending just as the sweet aftertaste finally begins to emerge.

Tricolor Dango.desc: A soft, glutinous snack. The luster of these dango is like the falling morning dew, and it gives off the feeling of lush flowers and branches. The surpassing knife-work has imparted the greatest mouthfeel upon the ingredients possible. The delicate texture, the exquisite springiness, the natural sweetness... it is like something living is leaping inside your mouth — straight from the ocean and into your heart.

Tonkotsu Ramen.desc: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The springy noodles have absorbed the essence of the soup, and the accoutrements have added all manner of variation to the mouthfeel. The soup has preserved the strong fragrance of the bones used to make it, yet goes down gently without that greasy feeling. Before you know it, the bowl's all gone, and you've still got room for more.

The rich fats ooze out as the fish meets the grill, and with those sizzling sounds, the fish is clothed in a burnished golden coat. The meat is firm but delicious, and the mouthfeel is quite delicate. Such is the unsurpassed gift of the seas.

Tahchin.desc: A classic rice dish served in large quantities. With the first bite, the crispy outside cracks with delightful crunching sounds. The second bite combines the soft and moist rice with juicy meat in your mouth. Then, the third bite brings in the Padisarah's fragrance... The last bite, however, leaves your heart empty. What a pity it is, that you are too full to continue this wondrous experience. Well then, why not have another serving tomorrow?

effect.Suspicious Tahchin: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Tahchin: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Delicious Tahchin: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

Lambad Fish Roll.name: Lambad Fish Roll
Lambad Fish Roll.desc: A grilled fish dish with a faint floral scent. The rolling golden fish meat and fragrant rose petals remind you of the billowing waves on the sea surface, colored crimson by the setting sun. You see why the dish is also called "the Romance of Sailors." W—Wait just a minute! Does this mean that Lambad's adventure stories are not exaggerated after all?

Curry Shrimp.name: Curry Shrimp
Curry Shrimp.desc: A simple, common dish in Sumeru. Big shrimps are dipped in a creamy sauce, absorbing its rich flavor. The passionate aroma easily finds its way into your nose. Even a person who claims to have lost their appetite will drool over it.

Tandoori Roast Chicken.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
Tandoori Roast Chicken.desc: A signature chicken dish in Sumeru. The vibrant flames have locked the umami inside the chicken's reddened skin. Once it slips into your mouth, the rich flavor will awaken your every taste bud. The chicken and spices seem to have performed a mysterious Sumeru dance on the tip of your tongue, evoking the image of a festive banquet...

effect.Suspicious Tandoori Roast Chicken: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

effect.Delicious Tandoori Roast Chicken: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Potato Boat.name: Potato Boat
Potato Boat.desc: A baked appetizer. The oozing cheese flows forth like a golden river, carrying an alluring aroma into your mouth. Soon, you will be amazed by the freshness of the Rukkhashava Mushrooms and the softness of the potato. You can't help but wish that this leisurely and savory tour might last a little longer...

effect.Suspicious Potato Boat: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.
effect.Potato Boat: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.
effect.Delicious Potato Boat: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

Fish With Cream Sauce.name: Fish With Cream Sauce
Fish With Cream Sauce.desc: A fish dish served with sauce. The translucent fillet lies upon exquisite cream sauce, offering a burst of freshness reminiscent of fish leaping from water with just one bite.

Charcoal-Baked Ajilenakh Cake.name: Charcoal-Baked Ajilenakh Cake
Charcoal-Baked Ajilenakh Cake.desc: A dark-colored pastry. The pastry is fine, almost lustrous, and the fragrance of the Ajilenakh Nuts is both vivid and full of warmth. The cake is fluffy and delicate as it enters your mouth, exorcising exhaustion and muzzling misery. Ah, just as a book may not be judged by its cover, so too should a cake not be convicted by its crust.

Baklava.name: Baklava
Baklava.desc: A traditional Sumeru dessert. A certain researcher once said that the people of Sumeru can be split into two categories. Those who eat desserts to live, and those who live to eat desserts. The thin puff pastry layers of this dish, and the bone-piercing aroma of butter and honey, may yet consign all who taste it into the second camp.

Candied Ajilenakh Nut.name: Candied Ajilenakh Nut
Candied Ajilenakh Nut.desc: A rich dessert. The syrup itself melts upon contact with your mouth, revealing the nut like a gem swathed in velvet, layer leading on to layer of joy. One small bite, and it is as if you are soaked in a tub of silken sweetness. Why, you really, really must make a few pieces more next time!

effect.Suspicious Candied Ajilenakh Nut: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Padisarah Pudding.name: Padisarah Pudding
Padisarah Pudding.desc: A popular dessert in Sumeru. The moment it enters your mouth, the springy mouthfeel makes you feel like you're wandering atop milk-flavored clouds. As you savor its flavors, the blended fragrance of Padisarah and Sumeru Rose fills the air. When you finally do reach that very last bite, it feels like something has been left unfinished. You cannot help but lick the back of your spoon, as if to savor the final sublime moments of enjoyment.

effect.Suspicious Padisarah Pudding: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

No oily meats were used to make this dish, and yet its flavor is more alluring still. This dish stacks flavor like the endless dunes themselves, bringing a most unique satisfaction.

Fruits of the Festival.name: Fruits of the Festival
Fruits of the Festival.desc: A brightly colored non-alcoholic beverage. The sublime enjoyment brought by the refreshing taste is almost like a sweet, illusory dream. One small sip transports you onto a white, sandy beach, where the sparkling seawater beats with the rhythm to which the hymn of your leisurely vacation shall be composed.

Rose Custard.name: Rose Custard

Samosa.desc: A deep-fried snack. Each golden, crispy pocket is stuffed full with a soft, glutinous filling. You can't help but wolf one down immediately, and then reach out for a second one, taking your time to savor it... Piece by piece, you become lost in the dish's enticing aroma, and before you know it, you are only left with an empty plate.

Sabz Meat Stew.desc: A meat stew with a unique taste. The fragrant ingredients complement each other perfectly. Large pieces of fresh meat are stewed until tender and coated in dark green, as if inviting all who taste it for a leisurely stroll in the forest.

The unique spice blend dances along with the rhythm of the meat aromas, playing the desert's tune upon your taste buds, with your tongue helpless but to applaud.

Cream of Mushroom Soup.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup

Lasagna.name: Lasagna

Vessie Chicken.desc: A famous Fontainian cuisine. Delicious juice locked inside the meat gives off a rich and layered aroma. This dish is considered a highly sought-after cuisine by many gourmets. After wolfing down the whole plate, one can't help but lick their lips, savoring the lingering scent. This exquisite cuisine is no doubt the crown jewel of Fontaine's gastronomy.

Pate de Fruit.name: Pate de Fruit
Pate de Fruit.desc: A gummy candy. It fills your mouth with fruity aromas as if a whole orchard were condensed inside the little gummy. Before you know it, you've devoured the entire jar, and not even the frosting on your fingers is spared!

Conch Madeleine.desc: A lovely-looking dessert. There's a saying in Fontaine: "There are only two types of people: those who love Conch Madeleine and those who haven't tried it." Everyone falls in love with this cake the instant they taste it!

Trout Amandine.name: Trout Amandine

Barbeque Ribs.desc: A tender meat dish with crispy skin. Even before it has been taken off the grill, the enticing meaty aroma assails your nostrils with promises of heaven. As you savor the flavor, the abundant meaty aroma fills your mouth with a bountiful aftertaste that lingers long after you have finished. No wonder it inspires such strong emotions in the hearts of poets, and they can seldom resist dedicating a paean to this dish after trying it.

effect.Delicious Tripes du Port: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

Tomates Narbonnaises.name: Tomates Narbonnaises
Tomates Narbonnaises.desc: A dish of meat and vegetables. Juicy mouthwatering tomatoes filled with hearty meat, each one has an agile, charming aroma, which explodes into a splendid savor after biting into it. After eating a single one, all the dark clouds in your heart will have been banished by the rich deliciousness emanating from your tongue.

effect.Suspicious Tomates Narbonnaises: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Tomates Narbonnaises: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Tomates Narbonnaises: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Consomme.name: Consomme
Consomme.desc: A soup with a complex recipe. A clear soup the combines the essence of the boundless blue skies above and the limitless land below, the aromas of meat and vegetables blended seamlessly into a greater whole. No wonder a columnist for The Steambird, once unable to squeeze out a single word onto the blank paper before them, drank a single bowl and immediately became a font of literary genius, every word nearly as exquisite as this dish.

effect.Suspicious Consomme: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Consomme: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Consomme: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Boudin Noir aux Pommes.name: Boudin Noir aux Pommes
Boudin Noir aux Pommes.desc: A traditional Fontainian dish. A perfect combination, with the sweet fragrance of the apples neutralizing the fat of the blood sausage. An enticing, slightly burnt smell wafts upwards from the plate, and the eyes of those who see it light up as they shout with joy and anticipation.

effect.Suspicious Boudin Noir aux Pommes: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Boudin Noir aux Pommes: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Boudin Noir aux Pommes: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Cassoulet.name: Cassoulet
Cassoulet.desc: A simple rustic stew. Time is the most wondrous of weapons for catalyzing the creation of deliciousness, and time allows the meat in this dish to soak up the ocean of stewed flavor it is bathing in, becoming soft and fragrant. Together with the rich aroma of the beans, it conjures a warm delight in one's mouth that stirs the spirit.

effect.Suspicious Cassoulet: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Cassoulet: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Cassoulet: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Crepes Suzette.name: Crepes Suzette
Crepes Suzette.desc: Crepes with fillings. The light cream and delectable jam are composed into a symphony of flavor, folded into a masterfully cooked soft crepe, as though robed in silken perfection, inviting your tongue to join an elegant, endless waltz of culinary delight.

effect.Suspicious Crepes Suzette: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Crepes Suzette: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Crepes Suzette: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

La Lettre a Focalors.name: La Lettre a Focalors
La Lettre a Focalors.desc: A small cake, shaped into a long rectangle. The endlessly indulgent aroma of coffee and almonds draws you in and pushes your thoughts forward, as though you absentmindedly stumbled into an extravagant opera without even realizing it. You find yourself drowning in the twists and turns of this luxurious performance, and only hope that the finale never comes.

effect.Suspicious La Lettre a Focalors: Increases all party members' Max HP by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.La Lettre a Focalors: Increases all party members' Max HP by 22% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious La Lettre a Focalors: Increases all party members' Max HP by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Blubber Profiterole.name: Blubber Profiterole
Blubber Profiterole.desc: A cream-filled dessert. After the first morsel crosses your lips, you simply cannot help but scarf the rest down! Even the remnants of the cream lingering on the corners of your mouth is enough to flood your heart with contented bliss. If only every meal could be followed by such sweet perfection... Ah! How wondrous would this adventrous life be!

effect.Suspicious Blubber Profiterole: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Blubber Profiterole: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Blubber Profiterole: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Feast-O's.name: Feast-O's
Feast-O's.desc: A golden brown fried snack. Freshly fried and fully fragrant they come, ready to get appetites roaring. With the ring in your left hand and the round in your right, behold, the crest of crispness lies in your grasp. Dig in! Let the flavor flood forth into your mouth.

effect.Suspicious Feast-O's: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Feast-O's: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 17% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Feast-O's: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Rainbow Macarons.name: Rainbow Macarons
Rainbow Macarons.desc: Small, multi-colored round pastries. The crisp shell wraps a thick, soft filling, and all is right with the world. Try one, and it shall be as if a little kitten's nose is nuzzling against your chest. Surely no one could help but fall for such an experience.

effect.Suspicious Rainbow Macarons: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Rainbow Macarons: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Rainbow Macarons: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Deep-Fried Doublecrisp.name: Deep-Fried Doublecrisp
Deep-Fried Doublecrisp.desc: One of Liyue's famous dishes. Scalloped red and white meat flowers, stir-fried as one, bloom tastiness on the tip of the tongue. Smooth, crispy, salty, and delicious, this is a must-have dish. You won't stop singing its praises even as you lick the plate clean.

effect.Suspicious Deep-Fried Doublecrisp: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Deep-Fried Doublecrisp: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Deep-Fried Doublecrisp: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Braised Meatball.name: Braised Meatball
Braised Meatball.desc: A classic Liyue dish. Emerald green onions and the ruby red meatball complement each other perfectly, while exquisite and extraordinary knife skills make for a melt-in-your-mouth meatball, fatty but not greasy, guaranteed to have you praising it all week. Don't forget to clean your plate for good luck!

effect.Suspicious Braised Meatball: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Braised Meatball: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Braised Meatball: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Honey Char Siu.name: Honey Char Siu
Honey Char Siu.desc: A type of roasted meat from Liyue. Richly red in color, aromatic, and intensely flavorful. Why, one might even faint from gluttony if one stares at it for too long. Between mouthfuls of delicious meat and rich sauce, one bowl of rice might seem too measly a match for this taste experience!

effect.Suspicious Honey Char Siu: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Honey Char Siu: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Delicious Honey Char Siu: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

Fine Tea, Full Moon.name: Fine Tea, Full Moon
Fine Tea, Full Moon.desc: A tea pastry containing egg yolk. The loose and delicate texture of the grainy egg yolk mingles with a faint fragrance of tea. One small mouthful brings earthy happiness enough to make you swoon. You could pop several in your mouth at once, and woe betide any who should seek to steal a single crumb from the corner of your lips.

effect.Suspicious Fine Tea, Full Moon: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.
effect.Fine Tea, Full Moon: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.
effect.Delicious Fine Tea, Full Moon: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Jadevein Tea Eggs.name: Jadevein Tea Eggs
Jadevein Tea Eggs.desc: A traditional Liyue snack. The aroma of tea finds itself perfectly blended into the eggs. A dollop of deliciousness whether eaten all in one go or savored in small nibbles.

effect.Suspicious Jadevein Tea Eggs: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.
effect.Jadevein Tea Eggs: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.
effect.Delicious Jadevein Tea Eggs: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

Tea-Smoked Squab.name: Tea-Smoked Squab
Tea-Smoked Squab.desc: A very popular dish. The translucent squab skin is crispy and thin as a sheet of ochre paper, and the meat is firm and plump. Accompanied by delicate gravy, this dish will capture hearts and stomachs alike.

effect.Suspicious Tea-Smoked Squab: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.
effect.Tea-Smoked Squab: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.
effect.Delicious Tea-Smoked Squab: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup.name: Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup
Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup.desc: An ancient dish, long recorded throughout history. As the milky white soup slides down the throat, you can only wish you had two stomachs. Eat a pot of this in winter, and you'll wish you were still eating it the following spring.

effect.Suspicious Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Guhua Fish & Lamb Soup: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Chenyu Brew.name: Chenyu Brew
Chenyu Brew.desc: Common Liyue tea. Your initial sip brings forth flavor on an elegant light breeze, the sweet fragrances of Chenyu Vale alighting upon your lips and tongue. Hark — is that the sweet tinkling of the mountain springs singing in your ear?

effect.Suspicious Chenyu Brew: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Chenyu Brew: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Delicious Chenyu Brew: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

Bulle Souffle.name: Bulle Souffle
Bulle Souffle.desc: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. It all starts with that glorious, fluffy mouthfeel. Then comes the rich eggy aroma and fruity-fresh flavor suffusing your mouth, as if you had plunged headfirst into pillowy clouds, such that the very air sings with subtle sweetness.

effect.Suspicious Bulle Souffle: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Bulle Souffle: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Delicious Bulle Souffle: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

Bulle Sauce Duck Breast.name: Bulle Sauce Duck Breast
Bulle Sauce Duck Breast.desc: A meat dish with the fragrant fullness of fruit. The citrusy flavor of tangerine gives the succulent duck a unique, fresh sweetness. It's so irresistibly delicious that you can barely stop yourself from reaching for the next piece even before you've swallowed the last one. No matter how much Fontaine's food culture has evolved over the years, it's no surprise that this dish has always kept its place among the classics.

Fricassee de Poulet.name: Fricassee de Poulet
Fricassee de Poulet.desc: A well-known Fontainian meat dish. The romantic rendezvous of cream and chicken instantly catalyzes a deep, rich aroma that lifts the spirits. It is said to be a favorite amongst Fontainians... One could feast on this fare for a lifetime and not fatigue of its fantastic flavor.

effect.Suspicious Fricassee de Poulet: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Fricassee de Poulet: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Fricassee de Poulet: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Meatnado.name: Meatnado
Meatnado.desc: A rather popular meat dish. The rich meat fragrance sweeps through you, body and soul, satisfying what your imagination envisions for bountiful meat. No wonder, then, that this dish often finds itself a place at any joyous gathering.

effect.Suspicious Meatnado: Restore 15 Stamina after any party member defeats an opponent. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Meatnado: Restore 20 Stamina after any party member defeats an opponent. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Meatnado: Restore 25 Stamina after any party member defeats an opponent. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Apple Roly Poly.name: Apple Roly Poly
Apple Roly Poly.desc: A traditional apple dessert. The mere aroma of the apples gives a feeling akin to situating oneself before a warm hearth. Before you can even think to slowly appreciate it, your hands move as if compelled by some other person, knife and fork in tow, reaching out for the next piece.

effect.Suspicious Apple Roly Poly: After you activate a Petrified Tree, a Ley Line Outcrop, or open a Treasure Chest, restore 16% HP and an extra 600 HP to all party members. This effect can occur once every 5s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Apple Roly Poly: After you activate a Petrified Tree, a Ley Line Outcrop, or open a Treasure Chest, restore 18% HP and an extra 900 HP to all party members. This effect can occur once every 5s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Apple Roly Poly: After you activate a Petrified Tree, a Ley Line Outcrop, or open a Treasure Chest, restore 20% HP and an extra 1,200 HP to all party members. This effect can occur once every 5s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Glittering Gemstones.name: Glittering Gemstones
Glittering Gemstones.desc: Multicolored biscuits. The sour and sweet jam gives off the clear luster of crystalline form, adding a shine to the crunchy treats. Such radiance! Such tastiness! What could this be but equal even to the most precious jewels?

effect.Suspicious Glittering Gemstones: A little surprise from the Children of Echoes.
effect.Glittering Gemstones: A little surprise from the Children of Echoes.
effect.Delicious Glittering Gemstones: A little surprise from the Children of Echoes.

Hot Spring O'Clock.name: Hot Spring O'Clock
Hot Spring O'Clock.desc: A pizza made using Grainfruit. The cheese pull is like a golden waterfall, descending into your mouth bedecked in juicy Grainfruit. The sweetness and saltiness blend on your tongue, luring forth a boundless appetite within you — even when you finish the whole thing, you could go for more.

effect.Suspicious Hot Spring O'Clock: A little surprise from the People of the Springs.
effect.Hot Spring O'Clock: A little surprise from the People of the Springs.
effect.Delicious Hot Spring O'Clock: A little surprise from the People of the Springs.

Puff Pops.name: Puff Pops
Puff Pops.desc: A snack with lots of different flavors. These surprising flavors of these "little bombs" explode between your teeth. Your left and right hands work in unison, sending more hurtling headlong into your mouth. Om nom nom — amid the sound of chewing, all your stress melts away.

effect.Suspicious Puff Pops: A little surprise from the Scions of the Canopy.
effect.Puff Pops: A little surprise from the Scions of the Canopy.
effect.Delicious Puff Pops: A little surprise from the Scions of the Canopy.

Saurus Crackers.name: Saurus Crackers
Saurus Crackers.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down. In the end, even the crumbs that slipped through your fingers were not to be spared!

effect.Suspicious Saurus Crackers: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.
effect.Saurus Crackers: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.
effect.Delicious Saurus Crackers: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Forest of Color.name: Forest of Color
Forest of Color.desc: A salad made from fresh fruit and vegetables. Sweet, sour, and many others constitute a forest of flavor for you to wander through, leaving you with a lasting touch of freshness from your taste buds to your heart.

effect.Suspicious Forest of Color: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.
effect.Forest of Color: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.
effect.Delicious Forest of Color: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce.name: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce.desc: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. Crisp, fragrant fish skin, tender fish meat... Ordinary methods, extraordinary flavor.

effect.Suspicious Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.
effect.Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.
effect.Delicious Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

Tatacos.name: Tatacos
Tatacos.desc: Thin tacos with filling. When your tongue touches the piping-hot shell and its rich filling, a pleasant fragrance gushes out from within, reminding you of a saying from Natlan — "Life might disappoint, but Tatacos, never!"

effect.Suspicious Tatacos: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.
effect.Tatacos: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.
effect.Delicious Tatacos: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

Sour Sauce Kipper.name: Sour Sauce Kipper
Sour Sauce Kipper.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. The sheer fragrance bowls you over in the first wave, with sourness and spiciness bringing up the rear, granting this fish layers akin to the tides, with you the surfer on a sea of flavor. Even when the tumult has subsided, your yearning remains.

effect.Suspicious Sour Sauce Kipper: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Sour Sauce Kipper: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Sour Sauce Kipper: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Chocolate.name: Chocolate
Chocolate.desc: Small spherical snacks. The texture is smooth as swan-down, and as it gradually melts, the Cacahuatl brings out a certain warmth that blends in time with a feather-light sweetness, with a magical final flourish that leaves smiles on everyone's faces.

Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes.name: Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes.desc: An exquisitely colorful dish. The eye-catching colors and soft, delicate texture contain overlapping tastes that bump against your tastebuds in a flavor firework show. Such a perfect appetizer leaves you in unsurpassed anticipation for the main dish.

effect.Suspicious Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Delicious Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

Cup O' Grainfruit.name: Cup O' Grainfruit
Cup O' Grainfruit.desc: A snack made from Grainfruit. The fresh, plump kernels explode on the tip of your tongue, like a lively party that leaves a lingering sweet aftertaste.

effect.Suspicious Cup O' Grainfruit: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Cup O' Grainfruit: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Delicious Cup O' Grainfruit: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

Grainfruit Meat Soup.name: Grainfruit Meat Soup
Grainfruit Meat Soup.desc: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. Any single spoonful includes soft meat, crunchy veggies, and a titillating spiciness... This cornucopia of shifting flavors decrees that you entertain seconds!

effect.Suspicious Grainfruit Meat Soup: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.
effect.Grainfruit Meat Soup: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.
effect.Delicious Grainfruit Meat Soup: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

Grainfruit Chips.name: Grainfruit Chips
Grainfruit Chips.desc: Crispy triangular chips. Crunch-crunch-crunch go the crispy pieces! You simply cannot stop pairing it with the sweet and sour sauce, the rich, fragrant cheese, the delicious shredded meat... Why does this combination have to. Be. So. Delicious?

effect.Suspicious Grainfruit Chips: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Grainfruit Chips: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Delicious Grainfruit Chips: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

Fried Shrimp Beanballs.name: Fried Shrimp Beanballs
Fried Shrimp Beanballs.desc: A deep-fried snack. After experiencing the culinary magic known as deep-frying, this has gained a golden luster, with a crisp shell that tightly locks the juices in along with a crackling, satisfying toothsomeness. Alas, for there only being two per dish! Alas, for you desire more!

effect.Suspicious Fried Shrimp Beanballs: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Fried Shrimp Beanballs: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Fried Shrimp Beanballs: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Blazed Meat Stew.name: Blazed Meat Stew
Blazed Meat Stew.desc: A spicy meat stew. All manner of spices bring out the rich aroma of meat. A well-tuned spiciness awakens your slumbering tastebuds with its touch, and as the meat meets your teeth, its rich juices spill forth, filling your heart with sumptuous joy. Not a drop, you declare, shall be spared. Not one drop.

effect.Suspicious Blazed Meat Stew: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Blazed Meat Stew: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Blazed Meat Stew: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

BBQ Beef Heart Skewers.name: BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
BBQ Beef Heart Skewers.desc: Commonly seen street-stall barbeque. The crackling flames and sizzling sounds herald an imminent feast, igniting your craving for that first bite. The firmness of the thick hunks of meat and the abundance of savory juices that burst forth with every bite perfectly complement one another in a culinary experience that might be called bathing in BBQ bliss.

Xocoatl.name: Xocoatl
Xocoatl.desc: A Natlan drink made from Cacahuatl. The rich, deep fragrance of the Cacahuatl is infused with a pure creaminess, tenderly caressing your tongue with the softness of smooth silk, leaving behind a touch of sweetness that is more than enough to melt your heart.

effect.Suspicious Xocoatl: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Xocoatl: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Xocoatl: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Rice Pudding.name: Rice Pudding
Rice Pudding.desc: A dessert made from rice. The soft, sticky rice and the sweet milk have melded together perfectly, their tastes complementing each other. If you eat it hot, you can enjoy the dense rice grains, and if you leave it till it's cold, you can savor the gentle fragrance of milk — each possessing its own beauty. People who eat such a dish cannot help but wonder: how many experiments led up to this moment?

Braised Meat.name: Braised Meat
Braised Meat.desc: A stewed dish. The rich soup sauce and fragrant meat combine to give off an irresistible aroma, while the scattered vegetables are crisp instead of soft, enriching the flavor of the dish... so much so that people will tuck in despite the intense heat until there is nothing left but the sauce... Wait, why don't we just dip our bread in that?

effect.Suspicious Braised Meat: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Braised Meat: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Braised Meat: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Oncidium Tofu.name: Oncidium Tofu
Oncidium Tofu.desc: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. The tofu, thread-thin as the autumn leaves, floats amidst the bowl, like mist in a forest, and the shredded bamboo shoots give the image a sweet, lustrous sheen, while the broth combines the essence of fowl and ham, giving off an unbelievable aroma. A single taste is enough to cause the customer to lose themselves in this fog of flavor.

Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns.name: Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns.desc: A traditional snack from Liyue. The intense charred aroma of the wok sits on the condiments, which are shoveled into the fluffy buns, filling the air with a fragrance that itself worth rave reviews. Just as the laboring hands of Liyue's people created this famous, prosperous harbor, these ordinary ingredients can be "developed" by one's labor into something surprising in its deliciousness. No wonder such a dish could even awaken a sleeping god...

effect.Suspicious Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% and DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% and DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% and DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

The Palace Jewels.name: The Palace Jewels
The Palace Jewels.desc: A deliciously fragrant Liyue dish. Soft, smooth crab meat is wrapped in tender, chewy shrimp meat, like a luxurious treasure that people unconsciously reach for. One delicate bite fills your mouth with flavor, like waves billowing across your palate as you float in a delicious river of shrimp and crab.

effect.Suspicious The Palace Jewels: Increases all party members' Max HP by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.The Palace Jewels: Increases all party members' Max HP by 22% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious The Palace Jewels: Increases all party members' Max HP by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds.name: Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds
Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds.desc: A unique meat dish. Each type of shredded meat plays its role in an orchestra of flavor, while the delicate seasoning skillfully blends the various tonal tastes. As one critic put it, just as there are myriad modes, nuanced notes, and complex compositional correspondence, so is it with flavor, the apex of which might even transport you to a different realm...

effect.Suspicious Trembling Strings and Rushing: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Trembling Strings and Rushing: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Humbly Enough.name: Humbly Enough
Humbly Enough.desc: A spiced tofu dish. The fried tofu comes with a rich soybean sauce as its classy chaperone. A single bite proves spicy with a hint of a meaty aroma, flooding your mouth with its mellow fragrance and long-lasting aftertaste.

effect.Suspicious Humbly Enough: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Humbly Enough: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
effect.Delicious Humbly Enough: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

Right at Home.name: Right at Home
Right at Home.desc: A staple dish with many ingredients. Golden egg yolk coats each grain of rice, the high heat having infused the rich flavor of the ham within. Such a familiar, home-style flavor will surely make any family or friends who've traveled from afar feel right at home.

effect.Suspicious Right at Home: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Right at Home: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Right at Home: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Eight-Treasure Duck.name: Eight-Treasure Duck
Eight-Treasure Duck.desc: A dish that needs true skill to make. The plump and juicy lucky duck is irresistible as soon as it's out of the pot. Add fragrant gravy and a touch of rosy gloss, and this can be said to be the perfect combination of color, flavor, and shape, every bite a veritable flood of flavor with an enduring aftertaste.

effect.Suspicious Eight-Treasure Duck: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% and DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Eight-Treasure Duck: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% and DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Eight-Treasure Duck: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% and DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Golden Fried Chicken.name: Golden Fried Chicken
Golden Fried Chicken.desc: Fowl that has been seasoned and then fried. The golden outer skin has all but sealed the abundant juices into the meat, leading to absolute enjoyment with each bite. The taste at your fingertips will linger in memory far longer than the instant it takes to reduce the meal to nothing but slim bones.

effect.Suspicious Golden Fried Chicken: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Golden Fried Chicken: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Golden Fried Chicken: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Golden Chicken Burger.name: Golden Chicken Burger
Golden Chicken Burger.desc: A burger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The fowl fillet has been wrapped in gold and is so tender that you could almost squeeze the meat juices out. The dense flavor of the sauce and refreshing mouthfeel of the vegetables makes you feel like you're walking on clouds as you lose yourself in this feast lying in your palm.

effect.Suspicious Golden Chicken Burger: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.
effect.Golden Chicken Burger: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.
effect.Delicious Golden Chicken Burger: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Fragrant Mashed Potatoes.name: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
Fragrant Mashed Potatoes.desc: Seasoned mashed potatoes. As you take a bite of this fine potato mash, an intense flavor develops on your tongue that is mixed with its natural freshness and the taste of dairy. Such a graceful flavor can hardly be thought to have emerged from an ingredient as plebeian as potatoes.

effect.Suspicious Fragrant Mashed Potatoes: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Fragrant Mashed Potatoes: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Fragrant Mashed Potatoes: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Meat Lovers' Mushroom Pizza.name: Meat Lovers' Mushroom Pizza
Meat Lovers' Mushroom Pizza.desc: A pizza freshly baked in an oven. Every inch of the crust is saturated with the fatty aroma of meat. Some mushrooms have been sprinkled on top to add freshness. Just a small mouthful shall greet your taste buds with the rich scent of cheese — most enticing indeed. You can't help reaching for another slice before you've even finished off the one in your hand.

effect.Suspicious Meat Lovers' Mushroom Pizza: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Meat Lovers' Mushroom Pizza: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Meat Lovers' Mushroom Pizza: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Sunset Berry Tea.name: Sunset Berry Tea
Sunset Berry Tea.desc: A fruity drink with a pleasantly sour taste. The redolence of tea carries your thoughts away. With one sip of this tea, you feel as if you are lazing in a flourishing orchard, tipsy in the gentle breeze that carries a fruity scent.

effect.Suspicious Sunset Berry Tea: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Sunset Berry Tea: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Sunset Berry Tea: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower.name: Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower
Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower.desc: A crunchy delicacy. The faint creamy notes melt on your tongue as you munch on the succulent mushrooms and crispy bread. This unmatched sense of satisfaction somehow leaves you insatiable — you do not even hesitate to lick the bread crumbs off your fingertips.

effect.Suspicious Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.
effect.Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.
effect.Delicious Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Super Magnificent Pizza.name: Super Magnificent Pizza
Super Magnificent Pizza.desc: An exceedingly sumptuous pizza. Amidst the heat that rises as it freshly exits the oven, give the crisp edges a gentle pull — a veritable waterfall of cheese gushes forth, wrapped up in the dense aroma of meat that satisfies the taste buds and gives a wondrous, hearty sense of fullness.

effect.Suspicious Super Magnificent Pizza: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 25% and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Super Magnificent Pizza: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 35% and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Super Magnificent Pizza: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 45% and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Minty Fruit Tea.name: Minty Fruit Tea
Minty Fruit Tea.desc: A cooling and refreshing drink. The sweet flavor of the tea combines with light, clear floral notes on one hand, and tangles with a dash of fruity on the other, filling your mouth and throat with their aroma. Wait a moment — why are there only ice cubes left in the cup?

effect.Suspicious Minty Fruit Tea: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Minty Fruit Tea: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Minty Fruit Tea: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Fruity Duet.name: Fruity Duet
Fruity Duet.desc: A dual-flavored fruity beverage. A small sip sends you to a beach paradise, the fragrance of fruit dancing upon your lips as you lie upon the white sands, watching the orange sun slowly rising, warming your heart and lifting your spirits.

effect.Suspicious Fruity Duet: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Fruity Duet: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Fruity Duet: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Fruity Smoothie.name: Fruity Smoothie
Fruity Smoothie.desc: A beverage of simple and clean colors. The refreshing smoothie with a faint fruity scent reminds you of the ethereal clouds above Qingyun Peak. Does it taste as light and fluffy?

effect.Suspicious Fruity Smoothie: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.
effect.Fruity Smoothie: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.
effect.Delicious Fruity Smoothie: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

Fontinalia Mousse.name: Fontinalia Mousse
Fontinalia Mousse.desc: A true blue Fontinalia Festival snack. Its crystalline coloration would not be ashamed if compared to the light scattering off the rippling waves. Its featherweight elegance is like that of falling petals, its airy texture like a snowflake melting in your throat. To eat such a delicacy must surely be the loveliest thing that could happen during the Festival!

effect.Suspicious Fontinalia Mousse: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Fontinalia Mousse: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
effect.Delicious Fontinalia Mousse: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Mega-Meaty Sushi.name: Mega-Meaty Sushi
Mega-Meaty Sushi.desc: Sushi made using barbecued meat. The tender meat bursting with rich juices quickly fills every nook and cranny of your mouth. Conquering the entire plate feels like you are standing atop a lofty summit, surveying the world below with pure satisfaction as contentment wells up from deep within.

effect.Suspicious Mega-Meaty Sushi: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.
effect.Mega-Meaty Sushi: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.
effect.Delicious Mega-Meaty Sushi: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Blubbercream.name: Blubbercream
Blubbercream.desc: Aqua-blue ice cream. The likeness of the earnest, adorable Blubberbeast printed on the cup adds a humorous touch, and the buttery creaminess is interwoven with a light, silken saltiness.
